net.wstech2.me.httpsclient

Class HttpsMessageOutputStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.OutputStream
      • net.wstech2.me.httpsclient.HttpsMessageOutputStream
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.io.Flushable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class HttpsMessageOutputStream
extends java.io.OutputStream
    An wrapper for the java.io.OutputStream instance create by TlsProtocol.getOutputStream() and used to write data to the remote host. This class will also coordinate with the HttpsConnectionImpl instance before a flush() operation.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      HttpsMessageOutputStream(java.io.OutputStream outputStream, HttpsConnectionImpl httpsConnectionInstance)
      Creates a new HttpsMessageOutputStream wrapping a java.io.OutputStream instance.

    • Constructor Detail

      • HttpsMessageOutputStream

        public HttpsMessageOutputStream(java.io.OutputStream outputStream,
                        HttpsConnectionImpl httpsConnectionInstance)
        Creates a new HttpsMessageOutputStream wrapping a java.io.OutputStream instance.
        Parameters:
        outputStream - An already existing OutputStream, probably associated or created by the underline communication framework, like the one from TlsProtocol.getOutputStream()
        httpsConnectionInstance - The HttpsConnectionImpl instance representing the connection.
